title: SpaceX Seeks FCC Approval for Massive Solar - Powered Satellite Network to Support AI Data Centers
description: Elon Musks SpaceX is seeking approval from the U.S. Federal Communications Commission (FCC) for an ambitious plan to launch up to 1 million satellites into Earths orbit, aiming to harness solar energy in space to power AI...
